item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossy)】M4A - Aaron Carter - The Music Never Stopped (2015 SoundCloud Album)
item.description:
​

The Music Never Stopped is an extended play project by American singer Aaron Carter, independently and exclusively released on SoundCloud on February 24, 2015. The project marked his first music release in thirteen years, following Another Earthquake (2002) As the title implies, Carter sought to silence critics and naysayers about the status of his music career.

The song "Let Go" was written by Carter to express his continued love for fellow entertainer Hilary Duff, who he briefly dated as a teenager. He would go on to release Love in 2018, his last major label studio album prior to his 2022 death.

Note: Before anyone asks or checks the files for "validity" - which is f*cking rude, btw - this album was never released on CD or other streaming platforms. The M4As were directly taken from the SoundCloud streams. If this isn't your bag, feel free to move on.


1. Where Do We Begin
2. City Lights
3. Wassup
4. Girlfriend
5. Let Go
6. High School Sweetheart
7. Winner
8. Tonight
9. That's Life*
10. Let Go (Alternate Mix)**

* "That's Life" was recorded during the sessions for the album, but was omitted from the final track list.
** "Let Go" (Alternate Mix) was alleged to been recorded in 2009 or 2010. The instrumentation differs from the main album mix.


Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: JayFantasi
